short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension reveals cookies current tab stores in your browser. Expanded view shows interactive chart with cookies split by origin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reveals data websites keep about you.
Extension icon displays how many cookies current tab stores in your browser. Expanded view shows interactive chart with cookies split by their origin.
It's improving your privacy by making website's data handling visible.
Third party cookies are commonly used for advertising, tracking, profiling and analytics.
Cookie consent popups formally give us the possibility to opt out, with this extension we can actually check did a website respect our choices.
